messages.messageBody:
all,
sorry for doing this this way. i am using my pacmate to write this. the email is working but i don't know hthe to start messages yet. anyone know how i can just view the sender and subject and tell it to download messages not just headers.
thanks.

Steph


-----Original Message-----
From: Faith Void <littlemsvoid@...>

messages.messageBody:
The March Unschooling blog Carnival on RUNning!
Come read the blogs. Enjoy the fun. Become inspired. Write in next months
blog carnival. Join RUN (Radical Unschoolers Network) on ning. Forward this
to other unschooling/homeschooling lists.

Thanks :-)

http://familyrun.ning.com/forum/topics/march-blog-carnival

Faith

--
